about_the_game:
Defender Pack


Become a true lord of warfare with the Warlord set bundle, containing all armor pieces for every class. Full protection from head to toe is ensured, 50 resurrection coins will definitely come in handy to save the day. You will also receive class-specific items: ammo pack for the Rifleman, defibrillator for the Medic and armor kit for the Engineer class respectively.

Let’s go over the exact contents:
  • Warlord helmets and vests for each of the four classes
  • Warlord boots and gloves (shared for any class)
  • 50 Resurrection Coins
  • "Scout" Ammo Pack, “Portable” Defibrillator, “Plate” Armor Kit

name: Warface: Clutch — Defender Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: Become a true lord of warfare with the Warlord set bundle, containing all armor pieces for every class.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
